PWM¶

robot.mock.MOCK_rpigpio.PWM

class PWM(channel, frequency)[source]¶

Bases: object

Object to manage PWM on a specific pin.

Constructor. Creates a PWM object.

Parameters:

  • channel (int) – channel to output on

  • frequency (float) – PWM frequency

Methods

ChangeDutyCycle

CHange the duty cycle of PWM

ChangeFrequency

Change the frequency of PWM

start

Start PWM with a set duty cycle

stop

Stop performing PWM on this pin
ChangeDutyCycle(duty)[source]¶

CHange the duty cycle of PWM

Parameters:

duty (int) – New duty cycle

ChangeFrequency(freq)[source]¶

Change the frequency of PWM

Parameters:

freq (float) – New frequency

start(duty)[source]¶

Start PWM with a set duty cycle

Parameters:

duty (int) – duty cycle (0-100)

stop()[source]¶

Stop performing PWM on this pin
